description: One click and an insightful tweet is posted on your behalf. This automation scrapes hacker news, finds the best post for your needs, reads it and tweets about it.
name: Autonomous Twitter Bot

description: This automation reads your inbox and replies to each email with an AI generated message.
name: Email Auto-Replier

description: Provides suggestions to enhance LinkedIn profiles based on industry standards.
name: LinkedIn Profile Enhancer

description: This automation reads all the emails in your inbox, categorizes them, and uses AI to generate a custom email body to reply to each email.
name: Gmail Categorizer and Response Generator

description: Provides suggestions to enhance LinkedIn profiles based on industry standards.
name: LinkedIn Profile Enhancer

description: Processes a list of news articles, summarizes them and categorizes them using custom user defined categories.
name: News Story Categorizer

description: Upload your resume and enter the link to the job posting to have cover letters automatically written.
name: Cover Letter Generator

description: This automation takes in a link to a podcast and a topic of discussion. It fetches the most relevant snippets about that topic and writes an article about it.
name: Podcast Article Writer.
